translation.en: Come on. It's OK. Go. Go, go.

translation.en: Hey. Hey, easy. Please. It's OK. It's OK.
It's OK, honey, we're coming right now. It's OK.

translation.en: We've been running. We've been running.
I have a lot of... a lot of layers on, that's all.

We're gonna be right there, honey. I don't have a weapon, I promise. Ah!

translation.en: Sweetheart, just stay there. Stay there. Stay there.
I just have an upset stomach.

translation.en: Baby, you wait for me! You wait for me at the stadium!

translation.en: I promise I will be there! You wait for us! You wait for us! Oh!

translation.en: Come on! Come on! Come, come! Come on, come on! Please! Come on! Go!
Come on! Come on! Come on! Go, go, go! This way, Rose.
She's all alone now. She's all alone.

translation.en: We need to get you some more antibiotics.

translation.en: They'll be moving slowly with all the roadblocks. We'll, um...

translation.en: We'll get to her on foot. We'll find another car.

translation.en: We'll meet her at the stadium, OK?

translation.en: Have some water and then we go, OK?

translation.en: They're never gonna let you through with me.
translation.de: Sie lassen dich niemals mit mir durch.
Ja, genau, Rose, das tun sie nicht.

translation.en: They don't know what the hell is going on and everything is falling apart, babe.
translation.de: Sie wissen nicht, was zur Hölle los ist, und alles fällt auseinander, Baby.

translation.en: Stop. Stop. I don't need to hear this right now. Stop.

translation.en: They don't have a plan for us, Rose.
translation.de: Sie haben keinen Plan für uns, Rose.

translation.en: We are on our own, do you understand that?
translation.de: Wir sind auf uns gestellt. Verstehst du?

translation.en: What does that have to do with our daughter?
translation.de: -Was hat unsere Tochter damit zu tun? -Hör auf.

translation.en: Do you want to leave her out there?
You want to leave her there? You want to leave her alone?

translation.en: -Is that what you want? -No, I don't! No!
translation.de: -Ist es das, was du willst? -Nein, will ich nicht! Nein!

translation.en: I want you to go alone.
translation.de: Ich will, dass du alleine gehst.

translation.en: I'm not gonna make it, Rose.
translation.de: Ich werde es nicht schaffen. -Rose, ich schaffe es nicht. -Nein.

translation.en: I'm not gonna be let through anywhere.
Any place we go, I'm gonna keep you out.
No. I am not leaving you here.
-Listen to me. You have to. -No. I can't. I can't, OK?

translation.en: Listen, let's go together, OK? I cannot do this on my own.

translation.en: I cannot do it on my own. I cannot do it. Listen.

translation.en: Baby, please. No, no, no, no. Listen to me, OK? Listen. Hey.
translation.de: Hör zu. Baby, nein. Hör mir zu, ok? Hör zu. Hey.

translation.en: Let's find her together, OK? We're gonna find her together.

translation.en: We're gonna know. We're gonna find her together. It's OK.
translation.de: Wir werden es herausfinden. Wir finden sie zusammen. Es ist ok.

translation.en: So, so, so, so, so much.
You have to trust me. I will get us there.

translation.en: I'm gonna get you some more water, OK?

translation.en: I need to go to the stadium.
I need to get my daughter.
Get the fuck out of here.
Go! Now, get out! Get out! Get the fuck out of here!

translation.en: Please. Please, I beg you, please.
My family's back there. We need to get to the stadium.

translation.en: Can give us a ride, please? We have food.
translation.de: Können Sie uns bitte mitnehmen? Wir haben Essen.

translation.en: I don't think that that is a good idea.
translation.de: Ich denke nicht, dass das eine gute Idee ist.

translation.en: Ma'am, you have kids, right? You have kids, huh? Grandkids?

translation.en: I'm sorry, I can't. It's not safe out here.
translation.de: -Es tut mir leid. Ich kann es nicht. -Hier draußen ist es nicht sicher.

translation.en: Not alone in a car. It is very unsafe.
translation.de: Und auch nicht alleine in einem Auto. Es ist sehr unsicher. Die Leute werden Sie aufhalten.

translation.en: People will roadblock you. They'll steal your gas
translation.de: Es ist sehr unsicher. Die Leute werden Sie aufhalten. Sie stehlen Ihr Benzin und lassen Sie sterbend zurück. Echt.

translation.en: and leave you for dead. I know. I'm a good person.
translation.de: Sie stehlen Ihr Benzin und lassen Sie sterbend zurück. Echt. Ich bin ein guter Mensch. Aber nicht alle sind so. Nicht hier draußen.

translation.en: Not everybody, though. Not out here.
translation.de: Ich bin ein guter Mensch. Aber nicht alle sind so. Nicht hier draußen.

translation.en: I need... I need to find my husband.
translation.de: Ich muss... Ich muss meinen Mann finden.

translation.en: I'll help you. You need a man with you.
translation.de: Ich werde Ihnen helfen. Ein Mann sollte sie begleiten. Ich sah, was los ist.
Ein Mann sollte sie begleiten. Ich sah, was los ist.

translation.en: I need to get to the stadium.
translation.de: -Ich muss ins Stadion. -Ja. Wir gehen dahin.

translation.en: Yes, we'll do it. Please, ma'am, I beg you.

Ich bin Ben. Wie heißen Sie?

translation.en: I will protect you and get you to the stadium safely.
translation.de: ich werde Sie beschützen und sicher ins Stadion bringen.

translation.en: Do you know what street this is? This is Hastings.

translation.en: Can you get to the stadium from here? I sure can.
OK! Would you like me to drive?
You may as well... This isn't even my car.

translation.en: You don't have to explain. I understand. We do what we have to out here.

translation.en: So, how old are your kids?
You're messing with me. Please. Shit! Get out of the car or I'll hurt you.

translation.en: You are going straight to hell, you piece of shit!

translation.en: Get out of the car! I'll punch you in the fucking face, bitch!
translation.de: Steig aus, oder ich hau dir In deine verdammte Fresse, Schlampe! Kapiert?
Steig aus, oder ich hau dir In deine verdammte Fresse, Schlampe! Kapiert? Die Tür ist verschlossen, du Wichser! Jesus.
Die Tür ist verschlossen, du Wichser! Jesus.

translation.en: You're going to hell, fucker! Whatever, lady!
translation.de: -Du kommst in die Hölle, Arschloch! -Was auch immer, Lady!

translation.en: Are you sure this is the right street?
translation.de: Sicher, dass das die richtige Straße ist?

translation.en: This is where he said. I just... I think it's that way.
translation.de: -Er sagte, es ginge hier lang. -Ich denke, es geht hier enlang.

translation.en: Unless you think we missed it.

translation.en: -I don't know. -You're the one that wrote it.

translation.en: Would you please just calm down for a second?

translation.en: Damn it! This happens every time!

translation.en: I'm just trying to figure this out right now.

translation.en: OK, I think we head east on Madison.

translation.en: I'm so sorry. No. Please, don't! Don't...

translation.en: Look out! Look out! Look out!
Help me, man! Hey, man! Fuckin' help me!
This area is under mandatory evacuation.

Dieser Bereich wird evakuiert. Sie müssen jetzt gehen. Gut. Schnapp dir deine Sachen.

translation.en: Don't let him out of your sight. We'll be back with transport.

translation.en: And don't get too comfortable, sunshine.

translation.en: We're gonna go for a ride.
I'm not the guy you're looking for.

translation.en: Yeah, that's not your problem, though.
translation.de: Das ist aber nicht dein Problem.

translation.en: You just do what you're told. Doesn't matter what's right.

translation.en: -Shut up. -All I'm saying, man, is you don't even know what's the charge.
translation.de: Hey, ich sage nur, dass du nicht einmal weißt, wer das Sagen hat.

translation.en: Some of y'all are taking the opportunity
translation.de: Einige von euch... ...nutzen die Gelegenheit, um offene Rechnungen zu begleichen.
...nutzen die Gelegenheit, um offene Rechnungen zu begleichen.
Hast du dir in die Hose gekackt?

translation.en: I hear how they talk to you, giving you all this shit work.
translation.de: Wie sie mit dir reden... -Du kriegst die Scheißarbeit. -Verpiss dich!
-Du kriegst die Scheißarbeit. -Verpiss dich! Hey. Beruhig dich, Bruder.

translation.en: We're just a couple fellas passing the time.

translation.en: -Yeah, well, I've heard enough. -Well, I'ma tell you again.
translation.de: -Ja, ich hörte genug. -Ich sage es dir nochmal.

translation.en: Doesn't matter to me. We're dumping you in the brig.
translation.de: -Passt dir das? -Es ist mir egal. Du kommst auf das Schiff.

translation.en: There is no more brig, man, where you been?

translation.en: No, no, no. I know where they're taking me.

translation.en: I know what they're looking for, too. Know what I mean?

translation.en: if I didn't have something they want?

translation.en: Huh? If I didn't know some things,
Dude, shut up. I told you--
translation.de: -Dinge, die sie wissen wollen. -Kumpel... -Ich sagte, du sollst den Mund halten. -Ich weiß etwas über Bargeld.
-Ich sagte, du sollst den Mund halten. -Ich weiß etwas über Bargeld.

translation.en: I know where the loot's at.

translation.en: What do you say? Some Bonnie and Clyde shit.

translation.en: Unless you wanna hold my dick for me.

-Gut, dann musst du nicht. -Komm schon, Mann.

translation.en: I won't be but a minute.
Why don't you be a dear and help me out?

translation.en: -Out of our way! -Move to the side!

translation.de: Kommt schon, Leute. Hört auf zu drängeln!
Ich stehe seit einer Stunde an.

translation.en: Back the fuck up! Back up!
Ladies and gentlemen, this access point is closed, OK?

translation.en: Let us through, that's an order!
translation.de: -Lass uns durch, das ist ein Befehl! -Nein, Sir.

translation.en: -That's a negative, sir. -I need to get to my daughter!
Can't you hear that? We're under attack!
translation.de: Hörst du nichts? Sie greifen an!

translation.en: And what the fuck are you gonna do about it?
translation.de: Was zum Teufel willst du tun? Wir können nichts tun! Du bist alleine.

translation.en: We can't do shit, you're on your own, lady!

translation.en: -Officer, open the gate now! -Sir, evacuation's complete!

translation.en: -We can't let anyone else in! -You took my fucking daughter
translation.de: Sir, die Evakuierung ist abgeschlossen! Wir können niemanden durchlassen! Ich will meine verdammte Tochter!

translation.en: Shut the fuck up! Shut the fuck up!
translation.de: Halt deine Fresse! Halt deine Fresse! Haltet das Tor!

translation.en: Hey, you can come with us.
